description: Sets up VPC, private subnet, firewall, default kms key, and private service access. Also activates the container registry

private_ipv4_cidr_block.description: The CIDR block for the private subnet

cluster_ipv4_cidr_block.description: The CIDR block reserved for pod ips in the GKE cluster.

services_ipv4_cidr_block.description: The CIDR block reserved for service cluster IPs in the GKE cluster.

k8s_master_ipv4_cidr_block.description: This is the cidr block reserved for the master/control plane in the GKE cluster.
